title: Riot really needs to give players a defence against auto lockers in normal games
body: Riot really needs to give players a defence against auto lockers in normal games. The only option is to queue dodge, so now I have to wait 6 minutes before I can play a new one, and I have no way to argue against the penalty I gained.

replies.body: Learn to not be a whiny lil bich, and just roll with it. Dodging is not your only option lol just brush it off and report him after the game if you really think its necessary.

How does asking for a defence against a player who refuses to communicate and directly ignores, and then countermands his team make me a whiny bitch. Also, I have no interest in then playing a game with that sort of player, mainly because if he is willing to do that in champ select, how is the next half hour gaming with that sort of a person meant to be fun?
Or you just learn to play every role.
I can play every role, but I just don't think playing with a guy who ignores everyone else in champ select, and refuses to communicate is going to lead to a very fun game.
you should just go bard then and aside from playing support like a regular person, whenever you can, do an 'accidental' bard ultimate that gets them killed.

The change to remove Normal Draft from most regions was highly questionable and poorly explained IMO. But on the bright side, with most regions having only Blind Pick now, the chances that Riot will take a good look at Blind Pick and fix some of it's issues, are far higher.

It's not just RU and OCE complaining anymore, now we have LAN, LAS, EUNE, KR, TR, RU, OCE and JP. At the very least, Riot's going to feel the heat if they don't make some changes.
Remove blind pick norms WE WANT DRAFT PICK

They have removed Draft normals from almost every server, so i doubt that will ever happen.
I just want the role selector in norms. I dont care about picks and bans. I just want to have the role selector.
they did have it at one stage, they called it 'team builder' but it was unpopular compared to other ques and they removed it. Was unfortunate, But that was a while ago.
